greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = (n^2 + k)*(n - k + 1)/2.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (rows 1..50)
formula: As infinite lower triangular matrices, A000027 * A000012 (the all 1's triangle).
example: First few rows of the triangle:
Example: Row 3 = (15, 11 6) since row 3 of A000027 as a triangle = (4, 5, 6); then taking partial sums from the right.
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, May 18 2010
ext: Name changed and terms a(37) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 17 2021
